summary.description: Max 2 sentence description of website functionality and purpose.

similarity_search_phrases.description: Core business function phrases for semantic similarity matching. Example: project management software, team collaboration, task tracking platform, agile workflow tools

vector_search_phrase.description: Single precise 4-5 word phrase capturing core business essence for maximum vector similarity accuracy.

segments_full.description: Complete domain segmentation with words separated by spaces. Must reconstruct original domain when joined. Do not expand abbreviations or add synonyms. Use only letters present in original domain core. Example: 'iastate' can split to 'ia state' but NOT 'iowa state'.

segments_primary.description: Main nouns that carry core business meaning.

segments_descriptive.description: Adjectives and descriptive words that modify primary segments.

segments_thematic.description: Words that specifically match website's topic or industry.

segments_common.description: Popular word components that could fit any domain as universal parts.

segments_language.description: Language of domain segments using ISO 639-1 codes, 'mixed' or 'unknown'.

domain_formation_pattern.description: Dominant linguistic method used to create the domain-core word.

b2c_detected.description: True only if core offering targets individual consumers (B2C).

b2b_detected.description: True only if core offering targets businesses (B2B).

personal_project_detected.description: Personal project indicators (individual portfolio, personal blog, hobby project, single person effort).

local_business_detected.description: Physical brick-and-mortar business where customers can visit in person (restaurants, retail stores, salons, medical offices, repair shops, etc.). Indicates physical location for customer service delivery, not just geographic targeting.

target_age_group.description: Primary age group that the website/product targets based on content, design, language, and product offerings.

target_gender.description: Primary gender targeting based on design, content and products.

geo_scope.description: Geographic scope of this specific website's target audience, not the parent company.

ecommerce_detected.description: Single-vendor online store functionality (company sells its own products directly to customers).

hiring_detected.description: True only if the site hosts its own career/apply pages or embeds a jobs widget for its staff.

api_available_detected.description: True only if the site exposes its own public or partner API (docs link, /api page, swagger file).

contact_page_detected.description: Contact us, get in touch, or contact information page present.

payment_methods_detected.description: True only if site's own checkout advertises Stripe, PayPal, crypto, or similar payment options.

analytics_tools_detected.description: True only if embedded tracking script for Google Analytics, Hotjar, Mixpanel, etc. is present.

knowledge_base_detected.description: True only if site hosts its own help/FAQ hub.

subscription_detected.description: True only if the site charges recurring fees for its own product or content.

monetizes_via_ads_detected.description: True only if display ads are served on this site (banner code, AdSense, sponsor slots).

saas_detected.description: True only if the site itself offers SaaS (login/signup to hosted software).

recruits_affiliates_detected.description: True only if the company runs its own affiliate/partner programme (signup form, terms page).

community_platform_detected.description: True only if the site hosts its own forum, user board, or social layer. Embedding generic comment widgets does not count.

funding_received_detected.description: True only if the company running this site reports its own funding round (press-release, 'Investors' page).

disposable_site_detected.description: Low-quality or deceptive website indicators: thin content, excessive ads, push notifications, instant redirects, poor design, minimal navigation, or lacking trust signals.

mobile_first_detected.description: True only if layout is clearly built mobile-first.

cms_platform.description: Name of CMS or site generator identified in source code.

primary_language.description: ISO 639-1 two-letter code of dominant site language. For English use 'en', Spanish 'es', etc.

external_links_count.description: Total count of all external outbound links (including duplicates to same URLs).

external_domains_count.description: Count of unique external domains being linked to.

internal_links_count.description: Total count of all internal links (including duplicates to same URLs).

internal_pages_count.description: Count of unique internal page URLs being linked to.

blog_url.description: Blog section URL in canonical format (RFC 3986) - provide only if blog detected.

recruits_affiliates_url.description: Affiliate recruitment page URL in canonical format (RFC 3986) - provide only if affiliate program detected.

contact_page_url.description: Contact page URL in canonical format (RFC 3986) - provide only if contact page detected.

api_documentation_url.description: API documentation page URL in canonical format (RFC 3986) - provide only if API documentation section detected.

app_platforms.description: Software platforms developed by website. Comma-separated list using only: android, ios, windows, macos, linux, chrome, firefox, edge, safari, opera

geo_country.description: ISO country code where business operates (US, GB, CA, DE, etc.) - provide if determinable

geo_region.description: State/province/region using standard abbreviations where countries have them (CA/NY/TX for USA, ON/QC for Canada, BY/NW for Germany) or standard English names from Google Maps for other countries - provide if determinable

geo_city.description: City using standard English names without diacritics (e.g., Munich not München, Cologne not Köln) - provide if determinable

email_list.description: List of email addresses found on the website that are used for contacting administration or other support matters

contact_email.description: Email address in RFC 5322 format. If obfuscated email detected (e.g. 'john [at] example.com'), convert to standard format 'john@example.com'

contact_type.description: Single industry-standard word for contact purpose. Examples: general, support, sales, info, admin, etc.

corporate.description: True if email uses company domain, false for external providers (gmail, yahoo, etc)

phone_list.description: List of phone numbers found on the website that are used for contacting administration or ordering services

phone_number.description: Phone number in E164 international format (e.g., +1234567890) - starts with + followed by country code and digits only, no spaces or separators

whatsapp.description: Whether this number supports WhatsApp messaging

contact_type.description: Single industry-standard word for phone contact purpose. Examples: general, support, sales, office, mobile, etc.

address_list.description: List of physical addresses found on the website that are used for visiting offices or mailing correspondence

full_address.description: Complete physical address as found on website

address_type.description: Single industry-standard word for address purpose. Examples: headquarters, office, branch, warehouse, store, etc.

country.description: ISO 2-letter country code for this address
